title: FRP-OCP Structures
description: Hajizadeh, M., Golub, M., Moldenhauer, M., Matsarskaia, O., Martel, A., Porcar, L., Maksimov, E., Friedrich, T., Pieper, J., 2024. Solution structures of two different FRP-OCP complexes as revealed by SEC-SANS. International Journal of Molecular Sciences. (This article belongs to the Special Issue Advanced Research in Prediction of Protein Structure and Function). [Forthcoming]

title: Review: Enzyme Inhibition
description: Hajizadeh, M., Moosavi-Movahedi, Z., Sheibani, N. and Moosavi-Movahedi, A.A., 2021. An outlook on suicide enzyme inhibition and drug design. Journal of the Iranian Chemical Society, pp.1-18. doi: 10.1007/s13738-021-02416-4.

title: QENS: Carotenoid dynamics
description: Quasi-elastic Neutron Scattering Reveals Structural and Dynamical Differences between Orange Carotenoids with different carotenoids and conformation.

title: TRSANS: Photoprotection
description: Time-Resolved SANS study of the thermal back conversion of Orange Carotenoid Protein from its active to ground state.

title: Vibrational Dynamics
description: Cryoprotectant Enhanced Vibrational Dynamics in Water-Soluble Chlorophyll Protein (WSCP): Unveiling Molecular Adaptations through Inelastic and Quasi-elastic Neutron Scattering with Glycerol.
